description:
One morning, Hayate goes to Nagi`s room to wake her up for breakfast, but he sees a large white tiger named Tama sleeping right next to her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sekai no Chuushin de Ai o Saken Dari Sakeba Nakattari Suru Shishi to Robo to Shitsuji
The Beast, Robot, and Butler Who Kinda Shout Love at the Center of the World
世界の中心でアイを叫んだり叫ばなかったりする獣とロボと執事
